original_text: My harp also is turned to mourning, and my organ into the voice of them that weep.
korean_text: 내 수금은 통곡이 되었고 내 피리는 애곡이 되었구나

sentences.original_text: My harp also is turned to mourning
and my organ into the voice of them that weep
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 오르간은 우는 자들의 소리가 되었도다
